bio:
CTO of Web3 Startup
Ex-Goldman Sachs VP
Ex-Hedge Fund dev
contributionDescription:
We developed and launched a Tokenized, Tradeable Wager platform on the Optimism network. This platform revolutionizes the conventional wagering system by introducing tokenized bets. Users can place wagers and receive tokens for each side. These tokens are not just placeholders but tradeable assets, creating an entirely new dynamic and market around betting.

By choosing the Optimism network for our platform, we have expanded its ecosystem, inviting a new class of users – bettors, traders, and gaming enthusiasts – to experience the advantages of Optimism, like lower fees and faster transactions.

contributionLinks.description: NFT contract for the Tradeable Wager
Permissionless Escrow for the Tradeable Wager

impactDescription:
By introducing our Tokenized, Tradeable Wager platform on Optimism, we brought a fresh wave of users to the Optimism network. 
The betting and trading community, previously unfamiliar or marginally involved with Optimism, started to explore and adopt the network more extensively. This expanded market potential benefits all developers and projects in the Collective.
